GR14vdhapadu:5: puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śubhaṃ ca__Vdha_Maṅg2
GR14vdhapadu:380: sa tvaṃ prahara vā mā vā__Vdha_002.028
GR14vdhapadu:488: yad yad icchāmy ahaṃ tat tat__Vdha_002.055
GR14vdhapadu:574: yac ca yac ca nṛpeṣṭaṃ te__Vdha_002.076
GR14vdhapadu:1528: tasmāt tvam apy etad amoghavid yo__Vdha_008.026
GR14vdhapadu:3348: anyā bhāskarasaprabhābhir akhilair bhābhir diśo bhāsayan__Vdha_028.*(18).122
GR14vdhapadu:3350: dorbhiś cakradharau gadābjamukulau trāsāṃś ca pāśāṅkuśau__Vdha_028.*(18).124
GR14vdhapadu:3621: svastho bhavaty eṣa vaco yathā hareḥ__Vdha_028.062
GR14vdhapadu:4682: na me dṛg eṣā tava rūpam etad__Vdha_035.024
GR14vdhapadu:4697: viśvasya viśvaṃ svayam eva ca tvam__Vdha_035.027
GR14vdhapadu:4705: padaṃ dhruvaṃ tat paramaṃ tvam eva__Vdha_035.029
GR14vdhapadu:4732: tair eva jānīma na yat paraṃ tvāṃ__Vdha_035.036
GR14vdhapadu:4768: maitrī na yeṣāṃ vinayāya tāṃs tān__Vdha_035.045
GR14vdhapadu:4772: yeṣāṃ na maitrī hṛdi te na neyā__Vdha_035.046
GR14vdhapadu:4782: tvaṃ sarvam etat tvayi sarvam etat__Vdha_035.049
GR14vdhapadu:4792: yo vai bhavān ko 'pi nato 'smi tasmai__Vdha_035.051
GR14vdhapadu:4816: yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti__Vdha_036.002
GR14vdhapadu:4817: yas tvām anu sa mām anu__Vdha_036.002
GR14vdhapadu:5529: jagac ca yo yo jagataś ca hetuḥ__Vdha_039.005
GR14vdhapadu:5530: jagac ca pāty atti ca yaḥ sa sarvadā__Vdha_039.005
GR14vdhapadu:5543: paraḥ samastasya ca yaḥ sa devo__Vdha_039.009
GR14vdhapadu:5579: trātaṃ jagad yena sa sarvadā prabhur__Vdha_039.021
GR14vdhapadu:5618: stutaḥ kramād yaḥ pradade sa sarvadā__Vdha_039.034
GR14vdhapadu:5624: surāṃś ca yajñasya bhujaḥ sa sarvadā__Vdha_039.036
GR14vdhapadu:5631: nihatya vāliṃ ca kapīśvaraṃ hi yo__Vdha_039.039
GR14vdhapadu:5659: kiṃ loke tad iha paratra cāsti puṃsām__Vdha_039.047
GR14vdhapadu:6395: prapāś ca kūpāś ca pratiśrayāś ca__Vdha_046.007
GR14vdhapadu:6411: tāṃs tān avāpnoty amalāṃś ca lokān__Vdha_046.011
GR14vdhapadu:6666: teṣv eva tuṣṭeṣv aham eva tuṣṭo__Vdha_050.018
GR14vdhapadu:6667: vairaṃ ca tair yasya mamāpi vairam__Vdha_050.018
GR14vdhapadu:7021: dyaur bhūmir āpo hṛdayaṃ yamaś ca__Vdha_055.014
GR14vdhapadu:7022: ahaś ca rātriś ca ubhe ca saṃdhye__Vdha_055.014
GR14vdhapadu:7024: tasmān na vācyam anṛtaṃ hi sadbhir__Vdha_055.015
GR14vdhapadu:7194: paṭheta yo vai śṛṇuyāc ca bhaktyā__Vdha_056.038
GR14vdhapadu:7360: tais tair guṇaiḥ kāmdughā hi bhūtvā__Vdha_059.005
GR14vdhapadu:7435: gacchet sa tiryag viphalāṃś ca lokān__Vdha_059.023
GR14vdhapadu:7621: sa no bandhuḥ sa no gatiḥ__Vdha_060.028
GR14vdhapadu:7724: sarvāṃś ca vedān saha ṣaḍbhir aṅgaiḥ__Vdha_061.017
GR14vdhapadu:7725: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca vane ca vāsam__Vdha_061.017
GR14vdhapadu:7731: na hanyate hanti ca so 'raṇe ripūn__Vdha_061.018
GR14vdhapadu:8504: divaṃ viyad bhūḥ kakubhaś ca viṣṇur__Vdha_065.016
GR14vdhapadu:8511: manye ca viṣṇuṃ na paraṃ tato 'nyat__Vdha_065.018
GR14vdhapadu:8515: sarvaṃ hi viṣṇur na paraṃ tato 'nyat__Vdha_065.018
GR14vdhapadu:8517: viṣṇuḥ samastaṃ na paraṃ ca devaḥ__Vdha_065.019
GR14vdhapadu:8525: na me 'sti bandhur na ca me 'sti śatrur__Vdha_065.021
GR14vdhapadu:8931: yad dṛśyaṃ yac ca vai spṛśyaṃ__Vdha_066.087
GR14vdhapadu:9272: tau ca svaṃ svaṃ vapuḥ prāpya__Vdha_067.063
GR14vdhapadu:9522: mā me dharmo hy adharmo vā__Vdha_068.037
GR14vdhapadu:9754: yathā paraṃ brahma haris tathā paraṃ__Vdha_069.029
GR14vdhapadu:9794: kā sā rakṣā na tāṃ vedmi__Vdha_070.009
GR14vdhapadu:10461: yad asti yan nāsti ca tat tvam īśa__Vdha_072.062
GR14vdhapadu:10462: vedāś ca vedyaṃ ca bhagavān ananto__Vdha_072.063
GR14vdhapadu:11307: na te glānir na te khedo__Vdha_075.044
GR14vdhapadu:11411: na yasya rudro na ca padmayonir__Vdha_076.021
GR14vdhapadu:11427: na yasya rūpaṃ na balaṃ prabhāvo__Vdha_076.025
GR14vdhapadu:11441: grastvā sa śete sakalaṃ jagad yas__Vdha_076.028
GR14vdhapadu:11469: dhig dhig ity āha sa baliṃ__Vdha_076.035
GR14vdhapadu:12576: na tv evāhaṃ tasya phalād ihāgām__Vdha_079.050
GR14vdhapadu:12798: kurvan vā karma na tv aham__Vdha_079.104
GR14vdhapadu:13677: yat tvāṃ pṛcchāmi tan me tvaṃ__Vdha_083.009
GR14vdhapadu:13847: yān yān kāmān naraḥ strī vā__Vdha_084.028
GR14vdhapadu:15074: yan mānasaṃ yac ca karomi vācā__Vdha_092.026
GR14vdhapadu:15075: śārīram apy ācaritaṃ ca yan me__Vdha_092.026
GR14vdhapadu:15585: yad asti yan nāsti ca tat tvam eva__Vdha_094.085
GR14vdhapadu:15592: na yat kṛtaṃ tat kvacid asti kiṃcit__Vdha_094.087
GR14vdhapadu:15603: tvayy arpitaṃ nātha punaḥ punar me__Vdha_094.090
GR14vdhapadu:15611: na santi te deva bhuvi pradeśā__Vdha_094.092
GR14vdhapadu:15613: attā mayā yeṣu na jantavaś ca__Vdha_094.092
GR14vdhapadu:15621: taiḥ saṃsmṛtais tat kṣaṇam eva deva__Vdha_094.094
GR14vdhapadu:15666: bhūtvā kṛpālur amalām aja dehi buddhim__Vdha_094.105
GR14vdhapadu:15673: na tvām alaṃ stutipatheṣv aham īśitāraṃ__Vdha_094.107
GR14vdhapadu:15675: yasmād idaṃ bhavati yatra jagat tathedaṃ__Vdha_094.108
GR14vdhapadu:15676: yasmiṃl layaṃ vrajati yaś ca jagatsvarūpaḥ__Vdha_094.108
GR14vdhapadu:15678: stotuṃ bhavantam alam īśa na kaścid asti__Vdha_094.108
GR14vdhapadu:15680: kliṣṭaṃ mano 'sya viṣayair na mayi prasaṅgi__Vdha_094.109
GR14vdhapadu:15681: itthaṃ kṛpāṃ kuru mayi praṇate kileśa__Vdha_094.109
GR14vdhapadu:15682: tvāṃ stotum ambujabhavo 'pi hi deva neśaḥ__Vdha_094.109
GR14vdhapadu:15689: abhyarcyate vada hare sa kathaṃ mayādya__Vdha_094.111
GR14vdhapadu:15691: na stotum acyuta bhavantam ahaṃ samartho__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhapadu:15692: naivārcanair alam ahaṃ tava deva yogyaḥ__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhapadu:15693: cittaṃ ca na tvayi samāhitam īśa doṣair__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhapadu:15694: ākṣipyate kathaya kiṃ nu karomi pāpaḥ__Vdha_094.112
GR14vdhapadu:15695: tat tvaṃ prasīda bhagavan kuru mayy anāthe__Vdha_094.113
GR14vdhapadu:17207: te siddhāḥ sma na vai sādhyā__Vdha_102.068
GR14vdhapadu:17414: śrotā ca śabdasya hare tvam ekaḥ__Vdha_103.018
GR14vdhapadu:17473: tvatto na śītaṃ na ca keśavoṣṇaṃ__Vdha_103.032
